text: Richard Springthorpe (born August 23, 1949), known better by his stage name Rick Springfield, is an Australian musician and actor. He became popular in the 1980s thanks to a string of hit songs including "Jessie's Girl", Note: Used for Australian Singles and Albums charting from 1974 until Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA) created their own charts in mid-1988. In 1992, Kent back calculated chart positions for 1970â€“1974. and a recurring role on the TV show, General Hospital. ==Early life== Rick Springfield was born on the August 23, 1949. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Sydney Category:Musicians from Sydney Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian pop musicians Category:Australian rock musicians Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian singer-songwriters
title: Rick Springfield
